description: AppSettings is the Schema for the appsettings API.

apiVersion.description:
APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object.
Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and
may reject unrecognized values.
More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description:
Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents.
Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to.
Cannot be updated.
In CamelCase.
More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

spec.description: AppSettingsSpec defines the desired state of AppSettings.
spec.title: Specification

stdoutCPULimit.description: Set the CPU limit for the application.
stdoutCPULimit.title: CPU Limit

stdoutLogLevel.description: Set the log level for the application.
stdoutLogLevel.title: Log Level

stdoutMemoryLimit.description: Set the memory limit for the application.
stdoutMemoryLimit.title: Memory Limit

stdoutMetricsPublishInterval.description:
Set the metrics publish interval for the application, in the format 10s , 1m30s , 1h30m etc.
0s indicates metrics publishing is disabled.
stdoutMetricsPublishInterval.title: Metrics Publish Interval
